titleStmt.title: The trovblers trovbled, or, Achan condemned and execvted. a sermon preached before sundry of the honourable House of Commons at Westminster, April 4, 1641. / By Samuel Fairecloth, pastor of the congregation of Ketton in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Faireclough, Samuel, 1594-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Cotes for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his Shop at the entrance into Popes-head-Alley, out of Lumbard street.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop at the entrance into Popes-head-Alley, out of Lumbard street.
